entry.summary: RT wolovim.eth last week to apply for the @EFDevcon scholars program -- scholars receive a conf ticket + travel/lodging/etc. funding! ⚡️ apply by Aug 1 ⚡️ Deva the Devcon Unicorn: Announcing the Devcon VI Scholars Program & Devcon Week! 🎉 If your attendance in Devcon could impact Ethereum, and you’re otherwise not able to attend due to cost, please apply for the Scholars Program by August 1st!
